item.description:
A group of seven recently saw a play at Barkers, which has been pleasing the East Side of Providence and the whole state since 1909. All loved it, and strove to return again. Join them. $25 per person per play. Join the Players, and get and 5 other events for $85/yr. Theater at its best. students are $15 per show.

Send me a check for 25 bucks for each seat.  I need to pay in advance, tho have ten seats put aside, like last time.  send to me asap... 89 Davis Ave, Cranston RI 02910

 

Got your check, nancy..thanks.
item.name: See "Ladies at the Alamo" at Barker Playhouse
